original_title: Small Town to Broadway: Joshua Castille's Story
overview: Joshua Castille was a Deaf boy growing up in a small town in Louisiana. On his 21st birthday, when he finished work, he realized... He wasn't in Louisiana anymore! He was performing on a Broadway stage. He had gone from a "Small Town to Broadway." This show is an hour and a half of stand-up comedy, musical performances, and motivational messages. Josh shares the tools he picked up and the messages he learned from people along the way.
title: Small Town to Broadway: Joshua Castille's Story
